TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DeclarativeCatalogPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart
Public NotInheritable Class DeclarativeCatalogPart Inherits CatalogPart

summary.span: 支持开发人员将 目录或其他服务器控件添加到声明性、页持久性格式的网页中。

span.span: Enables developers to add a catalog of or other server controls to a Web page in the declarative, page persistence format.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 正如在 Web 部件控件集中面向工具的区域 (有关详细信息，请参阅类概述)，有工具面向控件和每个控件必须驻留在某个特定类型的工具区域中。Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the class overview), there are tool-oriented controls, and each of these controls must reside in a certain type of tool zone. 在 Web 部件控件集中工具面向部件控件有两个显著特征：Tool-oriented part controls in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - 它们是启用最终用户进行个性化设置 Web 部件页上的控件的帮助器控件。They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page. - 它们是仅在特定显示模式中可见。They are visible only in certain display modes. 是必须驻留在一个部件控件类型的区域，如Web 部件控件集提供的区域。 is a part control that must reside in a type of zone, such as the zone provided with the Web Parts control set. 控件变为可见 Web 页时才显示模式下显示目录。The control becomes visible only when a Web page is in catalog display mode. 控件提供了一种方法，开发人员能够以声明方式将一组服务器控件添加到网页上的目录。The control provides a way for developers to add a set of server controls declaratively to a catalog on a Web page. 一个目录，在 Web 部件控件集，只是一个的或是可见的当页面已在目录中其他服务器控件显示模式。A catalog, in the Web Parts control set, is simply a list of or other server controls that is visible when a page is in catalog display mode. 用户可以从列表中选择控件并将其添加到网页，有效地使用户能够更改的控件和页面上的功能集。A user can select controls from the list and add them to the Web page, which effectively gives users the ability to change the set of controls and the functionality on a page. > [!NOTE] > 用户可以在目录中添加到 Web 页相同的控件的多个实例。Users can add multiple instances of the same control in a catalog to a Web page. 使用的一个优点控件创建的服务器控件的目录，它不需要编写任何代码。An advantage of using a control to create a catalog of server controls is that it does not require any coding. 页面开发人员可以使用完全以声明的控件 （或页持久性） 格式，因此控件的名称。Page developers can work with the control entirely in the declarative (or page persistence) format, hence the name of the control. 控件具有一个有用的属性，允许开发人员设置的控件，可在整个站点目录。The control has a useful property that allows developers to set up a catalog of controls that can be used throughout an entire site. 而不是声明中的单个服务器控件控件，开发人员可以设置属性值设置为包含应在目录中的服务器控件的列表的用户控件的路径。Rather than declare individual server controls within a control, a developer can set the property value to the path of a user control that contains the list of server controls that should be in the catalog. 在运行时，在目录中加载用户控件中所引用的服务器控件。At run time, the server controls referenced in the user control are loaded in the catalog. 这样一来，在多个页面或站点无法引用相同的用户控件，创建目录。In this way, multiple pages or sites could reference the same user control to create a catalog. 当更新服务器控件的用户控件的列表时，它将更新基于用户控件的所有目录。When the user control's list of server controls is updated, it would update all catalogs based on the user control. 类具有多个重写继承的属性的公共属性。The class has a number of public properties that override the inherited properties. 这些属性的大多数实际上不用于呈现控件;重写，则仅以便特殊代码属性可以设置对它们，像这样的设计工具中隐藏它们[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]。Most of these properties are not actually used for rendering the control; they are overridden only so that special code attributes can be set on them to hide them from design tools like [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]. 您不应使用这些隐藏的属性，因为它们不会影响呈现。You should not use these hidden properties, as they have no effect on rendering. 从智能感知和 Visual Studio 中的属性窗格中隐藏这一事实可帮助开发人员避免错误地使用它们。The fact that they are hidden from IntelliSense and the Properties pane in Visual Studio helps developers avoid using them by mistake. 在其各自的帮助主题中，这种情况下注明了这些隐藏的所有属性。All these hidden properties are noted as such in their respective Help topics. 类还具有几种方法。The class also has several methods. 方法检索每个对象控制在目录中，从而使控件来显示有关每个服务器控件的信息，而无需创建它的一个实例。The method retrieves a object for each control in the catalog, which enables a control to display information about each server control without having to create an instance of it. 另一种方法是方法。Another method is the method. 此方法获取的特定实例控制，根据传递给方法的说明。This method gets an instance of a particular control, based on the description passed to the method. > [!NOTE] > 若要提高可访问性，控件中呈现`
`元素。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. `
`元素中用于编辑的控件的相关的集分组控件使用，而且可以简化这些控件之间的可视用户代理 （如普通的 Web 浏览器） 和语音的用户代理 （的选项卡式的导航如屏幕读取软件）。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用以声明方式在网页上的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control declaratively on a Web page. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含的 Web 页面控件和一个控件。A Web page that contains a control and a control. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 该示例时加载的页面在浏览器工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使你能够更改页面上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables you to change display modes on the page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 代码示例的第二部分是 Web 页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 在页面的顶部是两个`Register`指令、 用户控件和包含两个自定义的已编译组件控件。At the top of the page are two `Register` directives, one for the user control and one for the compiled component that contains the two custom controls. 请注意，页面都有对的声明性引用控件，嵌套在适当的层次结构的声明性元素，如本主题的备注部分中所述。Notice that the page has a declarative reference to the control, nested within the proper hierarchy of declarative elements as described in the Remarks section of this topic. ``元素包含``元素，其中又包含标准 ASP.NET 引用控件和两个自定义控制; 这些是用户可以选择目录中的控件。The `` element contains a `` element, which in turn contains references for a standard ASP.NET control and the two custom controls; these are the controls that users can select from the catalog. 此页还包含编辑功能与控件在页面中声明。The page also contains editing capability, with a control declared on the page. 此控件使用户能够编辑自定义的特定属性控制和添加到页上之后, 用户切换到编辑模式的页后。This control enables users to edit certain properties on the custom controls after they have been added to the page, and after the user has switched the page to edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/CS/declarativeCatalogPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/VB/declarativeCatalogPartVB.aspx#1)] 代码示例的第三个部分是为两个源代码控件。The third part of the code example is the source code for the two controls. 请注意，这些控件上的某些属性标有`WebBrowsable`属性。Notice that some properties on these controls are marked with the `WebBrowsable` attribute. 这使控件为用户编辑这些属性在控件处于编辑模式时动态生成用户界面 (UI)。This enables the control to dynamically generate the user interface (UI) for a user to edit those properties when the controls are in edit mode. 属性也会标记与`WebDisplayName`属性，指定在编辑用户界面中每个控件旁边显示的标签的文本。The properties are also marked with a `WebDisplayName` attribute, to specify the text of the label that appears next to each control in the editing UI. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，选择**目录模式**中**显示模式**要切换到目录模式下的下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在目录模式下，可以看到可用于添加到页面的控件。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 添加所有三个控件，然后使用**显示模式**返回页后，可以浏览模式下的下拉列表。Add all three controls, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to browse mode. 三个控件显示在页上。The three controls appear on the page. 如果您使用**显示模式**下拉列表和交换机页后，可以编辑模式，可单击的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）**用户信息 web 部件**控件，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。If you use the **Display Mode** drop-down list and switch the page to edit mode, you can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **User Information WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑 UI 可见时，可以看到控件。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control. 请注意，控件呈现的属性的每个`UserInfoWebPart`类标记有`WebBrowsable`属性。Notice that a control is rendered for each of the properties of the `UserInfoWebPart` class that was marked with the `WebBrowsable` attribute. 如果编辑的用户界面和单击进行一些更改**Apply**按钮，可以使用**显示模式**下拉列表以返回页后，可以浏览模式，然后查看完整的编辑更改的效果。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是默认值; 没有构造函数声明中类，因此没有特殊任务执行时创建类的新实例。The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created. .NET Framework 在内部使用构造函数创建类的实例。The .NET Framework uses the constructor internally to create an instance of the class. 它是可能的但不太可能，将需要使用构造函数以编程方式在自己的代码。It is possible, but unlikely, that you will need to use the constructor programmatically in your own code. 控件的使用目的是页面开发人员将其添加到页面以声明方式在设计时。The intended use of the control is for page developers to add it to a page declaratively at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的成员作为控制，则不使用的 Web 部件控件集来呈现该控件中的任意位置。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，不应使用此属性;将其设置不起上呈现。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止开发人员使用此属性，代码属性设置对其隐藏在 Visual Studio 中。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 当您处理Visual Studio 中的控制属性不是属性窗格或 IntelliSense 中可见。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果你想要使用此属性，则需要创建自定义类继承自类。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自定义类可以使用继承作为它的属性，或将其重写并更改其行为。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 返回目录中可用 控件的说明的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of descriptions of the available controls in a catalog.

returns.span: 一个 ，它包含目录中每个控件的 。

span.span: A that contains a for each control in a catalog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供实现的抽象基方法中声明为类。The method provides an implementation for the abstract base method declared in the class. 方法返回在目录中的每个控件的说明信息。The method returns description information for each control in a catalog. 一个对象是包含有关的基本信息的对象控件，包括其 ID，对该控件，并继承自的几个重要属性的值的对象引用类，如和。A object is an object that contains essential information about a control, including its ID, an object reference to the control, and the values of several important properties that are inherited from the class, such as and . 方法将会提升性能。The method improves performance. 创建目录后，它需要一些信息，包括标题、 说明、 图标 （如果存在） 和一个 id。 每个控件When a catalog is created, it needs some information about each control it contains, including a title, a description, an icon (if one exists), and an ID. 而不是无需创建要获取此信息，每个控件的实例区域创建一个目录调用为将在目录中，并调用每个控件的方法将返回仅用于说明信息控件。Rather than having to create an instance of each control to get this information, a zone that creates a catalog calls the method for each control that will be in the catalog, and the call returns only the description information for the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此示例中有四个部分：This example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 包含的 Web 页面控件和一个引用多个服务器控件的控件。A Web page that contains a control and a control that references several server controls. 该页还包含调用的事件处理代码方法。The page also contains the event-handling code that calls the method. - 该示例时加载的页面在浏览器工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 代码示例的第二部分是两个自定义的源代码控件。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 该示例的第三个部分是包含的 Web 页控件。The third part of the example is the Web page that contains the control. 请注意，`Button1_Click`方法调用方法来获取的说明控制在目录中，并写出到标签的详细信息。Notice that the `Button1_Click` method calls the method, obtains the descriptions of the controls in the catalog, and writes out the details to a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/declarativeCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/declarativeCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，选择**目录模式**中**显示模式**要切换到目录模式下的下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在目录模式下，可以看到可用于添加到页面的控件。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 可以单击**显示 web 部件说明**按钮的标签的详细信息写在目录中的控件。You can click the **Display WebPart descriptions** button to write the details about the controls in the catalog to the label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回对引用控制其说明的详细信息的值匹配对象传递给该方法。The method returns a reference to a control whose description details match the values of the object passed into the method. 通常情况下，此方法使用连同方法，用于检索目录中的所有控件的说明。Typically, this method is used together with the method, which is used to retrieve the descriptions of all the controls in the catalog. 各个控件可以然后检索或操作根据需要通过传递单个对象添加到方法。Individual controls can then be retrieved or manipulated as needed by passing individual objects to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此示例中有四个部分：This example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 包含的 Web 页面控件和一个引用多个服务器控件的控件。A Web page that contains a control and a control that references several server controls. 该页还包含调用的事件处理代码方法。The page also contains the event-handling code that calls the method. - 该示例时加载的页面在浏览器工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 代码示例的第二部分是两个自定义的源代码控件。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 该示例的第三个部分是包含的 Web 页控件。The third part of the example is the Web page that contains the control. 请注意，`Button2_Click`方法获取的说明控件在目录中，调用方法来检索与匹配的第三个控件集合中的说明，然后将添加到该控件的控件页。Notice that the `Button2_Click` method obtains the descriptions of the controls in the catalog, calls the method to retrieve a control that matches the description of the third control in the collection, and then adds that control to the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/declarativeCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/declarativeCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，选择**目录模式**中**显示模式**要切换到目录模式下的下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在目录模式下，可以看到可用于添加到页面的控件。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 如果单击**添加 TextDisplayWebPart**按钮，该控件添加到页面上，而无需将其添加通过正常目录用户界面 (UI)。If you click the **Add TextDisplayWebPart** button, the control is added to the page without your having to add it through the normal catalog user interface (UI). 使用**显示模式**下拉列表，以将页返回到正常浏览模式; 添加为在页上可见的控件。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to normal browse mode; the control you added is visible on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的成员作为控制，则不使用的 Web 部件控件集来呈现该控件中的任意位置。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，不应使用此属性;将其设置不起上呈现。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止开发人员使用此属性，代码属性设置对其隐藏在 Visual Studio 中。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 当您处理Visual Studio 中的控制属性不是属性窗格或 IntelliSense 中可见。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果你想要使用此属性，则需要创建自定义类继承自类。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自定义类可以使用继承作为它的属性，或将其重写并更改其行为。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值显示在标题栏的控制控制在目录模式中可见。The property value is displayed in the title bar of a control when the control is visible in catalog mode. 当控件在页面中声明时，可以通过设置属性的值`Title`属性。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the property by using the `Title` attribute. 如果未提供标题的值，则特定于区域性的默认值用于描述此控件允许用户编辑的属性的类型。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kind of properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将声明性的属性。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此示例演示如何设置声明性标记中的控件的属性。This example shows how to set the property on the control in declarative markup. 如果未设置属性，或分配了一个空字符串 ("")，提供默认标题。If you do not set the property, or if you assign an empty string ("") , a default title is supplied. summary.span: 获取或设置用户控件的路径，该控件包含用于该目录的 或其他服务器控件的列表。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to a user control that contains a list of or other server controls for the catalog.

value.span: 带有用户控件路径的字符串，该控件包含一组 或服务器控件。

span.span: A string with the path to a user control that contains a set of or server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性，开发人员可以指定包含一组的用户控件的路径可以添加到其他服务器控件或区域。The property enables developers to specify the path to a user control that contains a set of or other server controls that can be added to a zone. 如果用户控件的有效路径分配给此属性，控件将自动添加到目录在编译时。If a valid path to a user control is assigned to this property, the controls are automatically added to the catalog at compile time. 属性会非常有用，因为它提供了一种方法来打包和重用的可用控件的一组跨多个不同的页面或站点。The property can be useful because it provides a way to package and reuse a set of available controls across many different pages or sites. 而不是手动声明在想要提供目录的每一页目录中的每个控件，开发人员可以使用此属性指向引用整个组的用户控件控件。Rather than manually declaring each control in a catalog for every page that wants to provide a catalog, developers can use this property to point to a user control that references an entire set of controls. 此外，属性可用于沿控件中显式声明``在网页上的元素。Also, the property can be used along with controls that are explicitly declared within an `` element on a Web page. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以声明方式和以编程方式。The following code example shows how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 此示例包含五个部分：This example has five parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 包含对自定义的引用的另一个用户控件控件，并通过引用在网页上的属性。Another user control that contains references to the custom controls, and is referenced by the property on the Web page. - 包含的 Web 页面控件和一个引用用户控件包含自定义控件的控件。A Web page that contains a control and a control that references the user control containing the custom controls. - 该示例时加载的页面在浏览器工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 代码示例的第二部分是两个自定义的源代码控件。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 代码示例的第三个部分是包含自定义的用户控件控件，并通过引用属性。The third part of the code example is the user control that contains the custom controls, and is referenced by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/CS/WebUserControlCS.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/VB/WebUserControlVB.ascx#5)] 该示例的第四个部分是包含的 Web 页控件。The fourth part of the example is the Web page that contains the control. 请注意，在页的标记中以声明方式设置属性，当用户单击目录显示模式下显示页面时公开的按钮时，属性值可以还以编程方式设置。Notice that the property is set declaratively in the markup of the page; the property value can also be set programmatically when the user clicks a button that is exposed when the page is in catalog display mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/CS/declarativeCatalogPart_UserControlListCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/VB/declarativeCatalogPart_UserControlListVB.aspx#1)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，选择**目录模式**中**显示模式**要切换到目录模式下的下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在目录模式下，可以看到可用于添加到页面的控件。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 单击**更新 WebPartsListUserControlPath 属性**按钮，而无需在文本框中输入一个值。Click the **Update WebPartsListUserControlPath property** button, without entering a value in the text box. 请注意，使用空字符串 ("") 分配给属性，目录将会更新，在页面中显式声明的控件仍保留在该目录。Notice that with an empty string ("") assigned to the property, the catalog is updated and only the control that is explicitly declared in the page remains in the catalog. 如果您键入的名称包含的用户控件控件在文本框中，单击**更新 WebPartsListUserControlPath 属性**按钮再次，属性现在指向用户控件同样，和其他控件重新出现在目录中。If you type the name of the user control that contains the controls in the text box, and click the **Update WebPartsListUserControlPath property** button again, the property now points to the user control again, and the additional controls reappear in the catalog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用包含在网页上声明为目录的一部分的控件的模板。The property references the template that contains controls declared on a Web page as part of a catalog. 中的声明性元素的层次结构中区域中，属性由表示``元素，它是子元素的``元素，并且包含中的所有显式声明的服务器控件目录。In the hierarchy of declarative elements within a zone, the property is represented by the `` element, which is a child element of the `` element, and contains all explicitly declared server controls in a catalog. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将声明性的属性。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码演示如何插入``元素内的``声明性标记中的元素。This code shows how to insert the `` element within an `` element in declarative markup. summary.span: 重写该属性仅仅是为了避免它在 [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] 设计器工具中出现。

span.span: The property is overridden only for the purpose of preventing it from appearing in [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] designer tools.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示控件中较长的行是否可以换行。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether long lines in the control can wrap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的成员作为控制，则不使用的 Web 部件控件集来呈现该控件中的任意位置。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，不应使用此属性;将其设置不起上呈现。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止开发人员使用此属性，代码属性设置对其隐藏在 Visual Studio 中。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 当您处理Visual Studio 中的控制属性不是属性窗格或 IntelliSense 中可见。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果你想要使用此属性，则需要创建自定义类继承自类。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自定义类可以使用继承作为它的属性，或将其重写并更改其行为。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
